point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items

sentences.english: One of the penalties of fame is that people point at you in the street.
sentences.chinese: 盛名之累之一是在街上遭人指指点点。

sentences.english: Never point at someone and laugh because they are too fat or ugly.
sentences.chinese: 永远也不要某人太胖或太丑而对其指指点点。

sentences.english: As if even hear them to steal steal murmurous , gesticulate.
sentences.chinese: 甚至仿佛听到他们窃窃私语，指指点点。

sentences.english: The true history is beyond our gesticulation in deed.
sentences.chinese: 真正的历史，实际上是不由我们来指指点点的。

sentences.english: We must not point fingers and cast blame.
sentences.chinese: 我们一定不要指指点点，横加指责。
